name: Shrinking
description:
This is the first bullet hell game I've ever made, it was made for the bullet hell jam 2022.

You play as a blue circle and you try to get the yellow circle when avoiding the red ones. However there is a twist, you don't lose life like others bullet hell, the borders shrink until you can't move.

There are more than 35 levels with 3 boss. Also the game is very hard.

If the game lags you can download it or active the low details mode.
